solution_line_template: She has {total_minutes} minutes to write because {total_hours} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes}
She will write {total_words} words because {total_minutes} x {words_per_minute} = <<{total_minutes}*{words_per_minute}={total_words}>>{total_words}
She will earn ${earnings_from_words} for the words because {total_words} x {earnings_per_word} = <<{total_words}*{earnings_per_word}={earnings_from_words}>>{earnings_from_words}
She will earn ${earnings_from_articles} from the articles because {num_articles} x {earnings_per_article} = <<{num_articles}*{earnings_per_article}={earnings_from_articles}>>{earnings_from_articles}
She will earn ${total_earnings} in total because {earnings_from_words} + {earnings_from_articles} = <<{earnings_from_words}+{earnings_from_articles}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
She will average ${average_earnings_per_hour} an hour because {total_earnings} / {total_hours} = <<{total_earnings}/{total_hours}={average_earnings_per_hour}>>{average_earnings_per_hour}
